channel.title: Moral Dilemma, Extreme Hardship: Someones got the same name as me
channel.description:
So the first time I did a name check on TMÄR I didn't find anything and I was pretty stoked about that. But then I decided to look a little deeper on Facebook and I found a guy under "Tmar". He's way more established than I am, 3.5k likes, verified on Facebook, copious amounts of music, the job lot!
Its not the worst thing in the world cause the only track I've released was the BTC we have just had. But its still an absolute pain in the sweed cause I've already had my username changed on here when I first joined and, Id rather not do that again cause I know that can cause problems for the big dogs running the Auxy.
I think I might have to bite the bullet and just change my Soundcloud name to something else. What would you guys do in this situation?
